original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 832: Give Yourself a Medal
original_content:
This week, Jonathan Bennett chats with Alexandre Dulaunoy and Quentin Jérôme about Kunai and CIRCL! How does Kunai help solve Linux security monitoring? Why is eBPF the right place for one of these tools to run? And how is CIRCL helping Luxembourg and the world deal with the modern security landscape? Watch to find out!


https://github.com/kunai-project
https://circl.lu/
https://www.foo.be/
https://euvd.enisa.europa.eu/


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.
Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: - Linuxセキュリティモニタリングを解決するKunaiの役割
body: 今週はKunaiとCIRCLのセキュリティ監視について対談。
titles: - Linuxセキュリティモニタリングを解決するKunaiの役割
- eBPFを活用した最新のセキュリティツール紹介
- CIRCLがルクセンブルクと世界のセキュリティ対策に貢献
- Jonathan Bennettとゲストの対談：電子工作とセキュリティの今
- FLOSS Weeklyポッドキャストの最新エピソードをチェック！
